.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx1030_srsrc_80eef6:

srsrc
=====

Buffer resource constant, which defines the address and characteristics of the buffer in memory.

*Size:* 4 dwords.

*Operands:* :ref:`s<amdgpu_synid_s>`, :ref:`ttmp<amdgpu_synid_ttmp>`
